Class AddressFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jpower.simplemail.filter.AddressFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter<Message>

    public class AddressFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filter<Message>

    Filtro para pesquisa de endereço da mensagem.
